title: Ow! My Balls!
description: The guy gets kicked in thu balls when playin roshambo. Ow, my balls!
altHero: Hormel Chavez straddles a wall and screams in pain
alt2: Chavez tries to climb a wall while a dog bites his crotch
alt3: Chavez lands straddling a construction horse
alt4: Chavez in pain, straddling a wrecking ball in the air
